entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Stony Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:18 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -24.5°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: -24.5°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:54 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 9:54 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:54 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
